Meanwhile former News of the World journalist Paul McMullan told MPs that he believed Andy Coulson , the former No 10 director of communications who quit over the scandal last month, must have known about phone-hacking. The real scandal is David Cameron would have been briefed: "We can probably get away with this one,' when hiring Andy Coulson , so Mr David Cameron is either a liar or an idiot, he wrote.
